alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 12 at 3:58AM PST until January 13 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow amounts are no longer expected to reach advisory amounts. Therefore the Winter Weather Advisory has been cancelled. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible, with chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...From this afternoon through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
